Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: 1.2 miles from Exit 6/Candia Road off Interstate 93

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: This diverse property boasts ±166,850 SF on ±20.44 acres. The building is fully air-conditioned and offers more than ample parking. ±10,585-40,614 SF of flex/high-bay warehouse space is available for lease with 25' clear height and energy efficient lighting. There are 10 loading docks.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: 25 Progress Avenue is located on the south Route 3 corridor, less than 0.5 miles from the F.E. Everett Turnpike and within five miles of the MA border.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: This 35,800 SF well maintained building has 12,700 SF available for lease. The space is fully air-conditioned and comprised of ±1,500 SF of office with ±11,200 SF of industrial space. The warehouse features 16’ clear height and one loading dock and one drive-in door.  The space and location make it well suited for warehouse, distribution, or light assembly. Taxes & CAM $2.00/SF.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: 189 parking spaces for cars and storage for 42 trailers

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: 2 Howe Drive is conveniently located less than a half mile from Route 101A, less than 8 miles to the Massachusetts border and within a 20 minute drive to the Manchester-Boston Regional Airport.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
±232,318 SF high-bay warehouse building. 
Situated on 16.05 acres, the building is currently under 
construction and will be available to lease September 2021. We 
are now pre-leasing space which is sub-dividable to ±24,000 SF. 
Features include 53’W x 45’D column spacing, 36’ clear height, 
56 docks, drive-in doors, 180’ truck apron and parking for both 
cars and trailers.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Less than two miles from Interstates 89 & 93

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
Granite State Distribution Center offers a superb location with visibility from Intestate 93. The building is strategically
located less than two miles from Interstates 93 and 89, 5.4 miles from the Hooksett Tolls and within 20 minutes of
the Manchester-Boston Regional Airport.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
state-of-the art build-to-suit will offer 40,000-500,000 SF of high-bay warehouse
space. The building will consists of approximately 10% office space, a warehouse with 40' x 50' column spacing, T-5 lighting with motion detectors (warehouse), loading docks with seals and levelers and abundant onsite parking.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Up to 20,000 SF of industrial space with 25' clear

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: The space consists of a combination of office and industrial. Office tenants can rent anywhere from 200- 5,000 SF of furnished space. There is up to 20,000 SF of industrial space available featuring 25’ clear height, heavy power and loading capability.
